issue.title: Fix search of a spec files in rake task
issue.body:
Fix a issue https://github.com/rspec/rspec-core/issues/1113

apply more a sensitive pattern to find a spec files inside the symlink folders

More details here http://stackoverflow.com/questions/357754/can-i-traverse-symlinked-directories-in-ruby-with-a-glob

issue.title: Use rspec -P pattern option in rake tasks
issue.body: rspec has an internal option (-P) to receive pattern of files to run via the command line, use this option in rake_tasks instead of passing through a huge list of files one by one on the command line.

issue.title: Fix pattern to handle symlinks properly
issue.body: This repros #1113.  I'm not sure how to fix it yet; I have no idea how globs and symlinks interact.

body: @marick -- there's a fix for this in #1672 if you want to give it a shot.  Sorry it took us so long to get to this!
